sen.j: 高梁 雄之進（たかはし ゆうのしん、天保六年（1835年） - 没年不詳）は新選組平隊士。
sen.e: Yunoshin TAKAHASHI (born 1835, year of death unknown) was a soldier in the shinsengumi.
Yunoshin TAKAHASHI (born 1835, year of death unknown) was a soldier in the shinsengumi.
Yunoshin TAKAHASHI (born 1835, year of death unknown) was a soldier in the shinsengumi.
He was from Sagami Province.
He was from Sagami Province.
He was from Sagami Province.

sen.j: 入隊時期は元治元年七月頃。
sen.e: He joined the shinsengumi around July of 1864.
He joined the shinsengumi around August of 1864.
He joined the shinsengumi around August of 1864.

sen.j: 禁門の変に参戦している。
sen.e: He was a party to the Kimmon no Hen (Conspiracy of Kimmon).
He joined the Kimmon no Hen (Conspiracy of Kimmon).
He joined the Kimmon no Hen (Conspiracy of Kimmon).
After the death of Sanjuro TANI, he disappeared.
After the death of Sanjuro TANI, he disappeared.
After the death of Sanjuro TANI, he disappeared.

sen.j: 以後、約十年間消息不明。
sen.e: There was no news of his whereabouts for approximately ten years.
There was no news of his whereabouts for approximately ten years.
There was no news of his whereabouts for approximately ten years.

sen.j: 明治10年5月に斎藤一と会っている。
sen.e: In May of 1877 he met with Hajime SAITO.
In May 1877, he met with Hajime SAITO.
In May 1877, he met with Hajime SAITO.

sen.j: その後、すぐに病死したというが、確かな証拠がない。
sen.e: It is said that he died soon thereafter of an illness, but there is no proof to substantiate the claim.
It is said that he died soon thereafter of an illness, but there is no proof to substantiate the claim.
It is said that he died soon thereafter of an illness, but there is no proof to substantiate the claim.
